categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Sorolis was a male Miraluka Jedi Master of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was part of the team defending Revan on the Foundry space station. He was killed by an Imperial strike team during the Battle of the Foundry.
Master Sorolis appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the "Foundry" flashpoint.
